ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of ELINOR SLOAN of Ottawa, Ontario, to the position of special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as a member of the Independent Review Panel for Defence Acquisition, to hold office for a term of three years.
